articles.title: Dexamethasone: what is the breakthrough treatment for Covid-19? - Inverse
articles.description: Six months and eight million positive cases since the COVID-19 pandemic broke out in Wuhan, scientists have announced the first major breakthrough in the search for a drug to fight the disease.
